articles.description: An update recently rolled out to SwiftKey for Android adds the option to swipe on the delete key to select and remove text. The update also adds the option to not add spaces after punctuation.
articles.content: Microsoft SwiftKey recently received an update that makes it easier to delete text. The last version of the app includes an option to swipe left from the delete key to select text. You can scrub left… [+1051 chars]

articles.author: Tanaya Dutta
articles.title: Motorola Launches Revou 2 Series TVs Starting At Rs. 13,999; Features & India Sale Date - Gizbot
articles.description: Motorola has announced the launch of the Revou 2 series TVs in India. They will be available in three resolutions and different screen sizes. And they can be purchased via Flipkart starting at Rs. 13,999
articles.content: Motorola has announced the launch of the Revou 2 series TVs in India. They will be available in three resolutions and different screen sizes. The HD-ready TV comes with a 32-inch screen, the Full HD … [+2508 chars]

articles.title: Vivo announces summer special offer for V23e in India with Rs 5,000 cashback on select bank cards - India Today
articles.description: Customers who purchase the Vivo V23e in India can claim a Rs 5000 discount using their ICICI Bank, SBI or IDFC Bank cards. Those with One card can also claim the discount. The cashback offer is valid till May 10.
